title: IStructureSystemMemberProfile.OffsetPiercePoint
description: Gets and sets whether to offset the pierce point of this member profile.
returns: True to offset the pierce point, false to not
remarks:
If this property is true, use
IStructureSystemMemberProfile::OffsetPiercePointHorizontalAxis
and
IStructureSystemMemberProfile::OffsetPiercePointVerticalAxis
to specify the offsets.
